Original:
我是大約17:00-18:00 左右進店，當時還是白天，當時酒吧除店員之外，我是唯一客人。

調酒雖口味固定，但皆是由現場調酒師調製，只是整體裝飾口味略顯單調，剛入口味道濃厚，喝到後面冰塊融化稀釋整體味道，就會變得非常水、不夠味。
店內品項也有軟性無酒精飲品，可供無法飲酒的朋友選擇，酒精濃度也有分三種等級，最濃的是shot 150/杯（沒記錯的話）。

服務很好，冷氣夠涼，店內也很整潔、乾淨，客席區寬敞、座位是貼牆式座椅及2出入口通道站立區，插座間隔設置於座椅下方數量不少。兩個出入口皆有設置垃圾桶。

整體價位與酒品尚可接受，就是一般臺北酒吧價格，杯子是用塑膠杯裝。

美中不足的是，此店目前暫不提供廁所。
對路過散客的招呼語是「你好～可以幫你介紹喔」建議可更換，因為從外觀上客人可能還很難判斷這間店是賣什麼的，北市鬧區的散客對酒品的接受度應該都蠻高的。

若有機會，願意再訪。

I entered the store about 17: 00-18: 00. At that time, I was the only guest except the shop clerk.

Although the taste of the bartending is fixed, they are all prepared by on -site bartenders. However, the overall decorative taste is slightly monotonous. The taste of the mouth is strong. When the ice cubes are melted and diluted the overall taste, it will become very water and not enough.
There are also soft alcohol -free drinks in the store. Friends who can not drink alcohol have three levels. There are also three levels of alcohol concentration. The strongest is Shot 150/cup (if you remember correctly).

The service is very good, the air -conditioning is cool enough, and the store is also clean and clean. The customer area is spacious, the seat is a wall -type seat and the 2 entrance channel stands. The socket interval is set at a large number of below the seat.Both entrances have trash cans.

The overall price and wine are acceptable, that is, the price of the general Taipei bar, the cup is equipped with a plastic cup.

The disadvantage of the United States is that this store does not provide toilets for the time being.
The greetings to passing the client are "Hello ~ Can help you introduce it", it is recommended to replace, because it may be difficult for guests to judge what this store is sold in the appearance. The acceptance should be quite high.

If you have a chance, you are willing to visit again.
